title: Family Grudges, Ms. Pace Interview, Adult Breakups, Russell Willson and more.
itunes:title: Family Grudges, Ms. Pace Interview, Adult Breakups, Russell Willson and more.
description:
Wednesday show opens today with someone trying to sound sexy.  Have you ever held a grudge against a family member or nah?  Steve has a very emotional interview on his TV show that goes viral.  R. Kelly may be going back to jail soon.  Nipsey Hussle's family says that his children are in no need of financial assistance.  Is there any good way to break up with someone?  Russell Wilson is the highest paid player in the NFL.  Charles Barkley has an invitation for LBJ.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about when God closes a door, he opens up another one and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
